title: Pixel 4 not turning on, left it to charge for hours straight, turned on once with dead pixels.
content: Pixel 4 not turning on, left it to charge for hours straight, turned on once with some dead pixels all over it. Than turned off and then nothing. Please can we fix asap I need for my daughter birthday Also straight out of the box, the store I bought it from refuses to take care as its a manufacter problem.
